main event: Several witnesses observed a bright, glowing light in the sky over New York City, which lasted for about 5 minutes before ascending rapidly.
interesting points: The object was brighter than surrounding stars., It maintained a steady course and speed throughout the observation., The eyewitnesses reported no sound from the object., The object's altitude was estimated between 10,000 and 20,000 feet., A previous sighting described a cigar-shaped object hovering in the same area on March 6, 1952.
location: New York City, New York, USA
